pages.text: Seeing as $(item)Gilded Blackstone$() has some peculiar magical properties, it seems perfectly reasonable to construct a pedestal out of it. These have been proven to excel at presenting items and providing their essence, enabling the performing of $(thing)rituals$(). Prior to this, however, the pedestals $(thing)need to be linked$() to the respective ritual's core.

This is accomplished by $(thing)shift-right-clicking$() first a pedestal and then the corresponding ritual core, all while wielding a $(l:conjuring:basics/conjuring_scepters)Conjuring Scepter$() of any kind.
